games.title: School Of Basketball
games.description: It is the basketball arcade game in which you must try to score baskets in all the different game modes available. A basketball school opens its doors for enthusiasts like you. Do you know where to aim the ball so that you always hit the basket? Do you know any secret strategies? You have a limited number of balls and every time you miss, you also miss one ball. However, if you never miss, on the contrary, sometimes the ball will be added. How many points will you score?
games.howToPlayText:
Touch and drug anywhere on screen to throw a ball!
You can play either arcade, time attack, and distance mode. Arcade mode gives you 10 balls to use; you must continue to score baskets although it becomes harder each time you score.
Time attack mode requires you to score as many baskets within the time limit as possible; you have unlimited balls but limited time. 
Distance mode allows you to increase the distance of your shot each time that you score. The distance decreases every time you miss a shot, don‚Äôt let the distance reach zero; otherwise, it is game over.

games.title: Animal Basketball
games.description:
Basketball games: The Power of Moe! Ultra-healing hand-painted physical shooting party

[Moe Animal Troupe Gathering] 
Manipulation will be serious kittens, cute chicks, naughty crocodiles! The cute characters come with their own exclusive shooting action, each action can trigger the screen heartbeat warning! 

[Visual Feast Blitz sports games]
‚óè Hoop game  with 100+ kinds of magical basketballs and special effects: pizza ball, fishbowl ball, baseball, etc. 
‚óè 4 healing courts: beach by the sea, countryside at sunset, deep forest, and dangerous cliffs - every basket will play tricks!

[Triple Pleasure Mode] 
Arcade Rampage: 60-second adrenaline challenge! Combo effects are stacked, full-screen blow-up effects are cool!
Road to the Championship: Challenge how many throws without missing it.
Achievement Mission: 200 missions! Unlock outrageous medals such as ‚ÄúBoard Wipe King‚Äù and ‚ÄúGod Pitcher‚Äù 

[Physics Ghostly Moments] 
Real Physics Engine x Moe's Magic Modification! The wall clock can also be used to shoot baskets!

Call your friends and have a healing and addictive fingertip hoop party!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:
Mouse left button to drag and shoot.

Mobile Controls:
Touch and move on screen  to drag and shoot.

games.title: Basketball Tap
games.description:
Basketball Tap is a fast-paced casual sports game.
Time your taps perfectly, launch the ball into the air, and score epic slam dunks!
games.howToPlayText: Tap the screen, control the ball, and guide it toward the basket to make your best shots and score points!
